|  [invRealSourceIDs](./rstream.streamsync.invrealsourceids.md) |  | <code>Map&lt;string, string&gt;</code> | maps real src.id to (potentially aliased) input IDs |
|  [realSourceIDs](./rstream.streamsync.realsourceids.md) |  | <code>Map&lt;string, string&gt;</code> | maps (potentially aliased) input IDs to their actual src.id |
|  [sourceIDs](./rstream.streamsync.sourceids.md) |  | <code>Set&lt;string&gt;</code> | set of (potentially aliased) input IDs these IDs are used to label inputs in result tuple |
|  [sources](./rstream.streamsync.sources.md) |  | <code>Map&lt;ISubscribable&lt;A&gt;, Subscription&lt;A, [string, A]&gt;&gt;</code> | maps actual inputs to their virtual input subs |
